I am a proficient Web Developer with 8 years of commercial experience using jQuery, ExtJS, OpenLayers, Jasmine, Spring or Hibernate. Through my vast experience I have developed applications from scratch, defining architecture and implementing solutions specially applying open-source technologies.

My core technical skills are oriented to Internet and Web application development with Java, Javascript and HTML5, over Linux(Debian, Ubuntu) environment preferably.

I am a code review believer who is focused on improving development productivity and with large experience with agile methodologies and practices such as SCRUM, continuous integration and TDD.

I am always willing to learn new technologies about web and mobile development. Currently I am learning about AngularJS, BackBones, Bootstrap and Node.js.

Seeking a challenging position as a Web Developer working with cutting edged technologies, like Angular and using modern tools like Grunt and Bower.
